utility.timelinePlotting

Class TimelinePublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • utility.timelinePlotting.TimelinePublisher

  • public final class TimelinePublisher
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class that that extracts SymbolicTimelines from components and publishes them as images.
    Author:
    Jonas Ullberg, Federico Pecora

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TimelinePublisher(ActivityNetworkSolver ans, Bounds bounds, java.lang.String... components) 
      TimelinePublisher(ActivityNetworkSolver ans, java.lang.String... components)

    • Constructor Detail

      • TimelinePublisher

        public TimelinePublisher(ActivityNetworkSolver ans,
                 Bounds bounds,
                 java.lang.String... components)
        Parameters:
        ans - The ActivityNetworkSolver used to calculate the SymbolicTimelines.
        bounds - The range in which to plot SymbolicTimelines.
        components - List of components for which to publish SymbolicTimelines.

      • TimelinePublisher

        public TimelinePublisher(ActivityNetworkSolver ans,
                 java.lang.String... components)
        Parameters:
        ans - The ActivityNetworkSolver used to calculate the SymbolicTimelines.
        components - List of components for which to publish SymbolicTimelines.

    • Method Detail

      • registerTimelineVisualizer

        public void registerTimelineVisualizer(TimelineVisualizer viz)
        Make a given TimelineVisualizer display the SymbolicTimelines published by this TimelinePublisher. Note that newly instantiated TimelineVisualizers are automatically registered to the TimelinePublisher given in the constructor, so there is usually no need to call this method.
        Parameters:
        viz - The TimelineVisualizer that should display the SymbolicTimelines published by this TimelinePublisher.

      • publish

        public void publish(boolean block,
           boolean skip)
        Publish the SymbolicTimelines. This method renders in a background thread (unless blocking behavior is requested through parameter block).
        Parameters:
        block - Set to true if the call should block until SymbolicTimelines are rendered.
        skip - Set to true if this call should be skipped in case previous rendering is still in progress.
